description: This file defines the SocialAccountsController class in a .NET backend project. It provides REST API endpoints to connect, list, and disconnect social accounts for the current user, utilizing dependency injection and ASP.NET Core MVC features.

classes.name: SocialAccountsController
classes.description: Controller class handling social account connections, listing, and disconnections for users through REST API endpoints.

methods.name: Connect
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST to connect a new social account for the current user.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET to list all social accounts connected to the current user.

methods.name: Disconnect
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE to disconnect a specific social account by its ID.
